original_title: Shortage of 266 medicines, says Ministry of Health
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Ministry of Health says that there is a shortage of 266 more medicines.
Its Additional Secretary Dr. Saman Ratnayake stated that out of 850 types of medicines, these 266 medicines are in short supply.
He added that the usage of medicines in hospitals has increased.
“We supported Ranil to stabilize the economy and establish democracy.” – SLPP General Secretary
